translations.Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit: Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit

WAIT_TO_START_SCREEN.MAIN_INSTRUCTION: The activity will start soon. In the meantime, please, read the following instructions:
WAIT_TO_START_SCREEN.STEP1: At the beginning, you will be presented with an instruction or a challenge.
WAIT_TO_START_SCREEN.STEP2: Propose as many answers to it as possible. Don't spend too much time writing a single idea.
WAIT_TO_START_SCREEN.STEP3: After submitting a first answer, you will see some ideas provided by the other participants. Choose one to build upon or propose a completely new one.
WAIT_TO_START_SCREEN.PAUSE_MESSAGE: The process has been paused by the admin. Please, wait for a moment.

INSTRUCTIONS.TITLE: Instructions
INSTRUCTIONS.HELPER_TITLE: Provide a main instruction to be shown in your activity.
INSTRUCTIONS.LABEL_DETAILS: Provide details to complete your main instructions.

ORCHESTRATOR.TITLE: Orchestrator
ORCHESTRATOR.LABEL: Select the orchestrator of the activity

ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.NUMBER_BOT_RESP_SET_LABEL: Number of bot responses per set

EVALUATION_TYPE_SELECTION.TITLE: Evaluation type
EVALUATION_TYPE_SELECTION.NOV_REL_RATINGS_BTN: Evaluate the responses by rating the relevance and novelty.
EVALUATION_TYPE_SELECTION.USE_NOV_RATINGS_BTN: Evaluate the responses by rating the usefulness and novelty.

EDIT_DIALOG.CHATBOT_NAME_HELPER: This is the name that users will see when they interact with the chatbot
EDIT_DIALOG.CHATBOT_PROMPT_HELPER: This is the name that users will see when they interact with the chatbot
EDIT_DIALOG.CHATBOT_PROMPT_FORMAT_HELPER: To describe the initial situation, create an object at the start of the array with 2 keys: 'role' and 'content'. For the initial description the role must be 'system'. Place your description of the initial situation in the 'content' key. Add interaction examples after that. Add one object per message with the role corresponding to either 'assistant' or 'user'.
EDIT_DIALOG.CHATBOT_CUE_HELPER: This defines the content of the first message of the chatbot. You can change it to better orient the conversation with the user.
EDIT_DIALOG.CHATBOT_CONFIGURATION_MISSING: This chatbot has not been configured yet.
EDIT_DIALOG.ERROR_PROMPT_NOT_IN_JSON_FORMAT: Prompt has to be in JSON format.

INPUT.HELPER: Write down only one proposition in this field.
INPUT.RESPONSE_BEING_SUBMITTED_ALERT: Your response is being submitted, please wait for a few seconds.
INPUT.RESPONSE_TOO_LONG_ALERT: Your idea is too long. Please, try to be more concise.

STEPPER.CHOOSE_STEP_LABEL: Read the responses of other participants

translations.CHOOSE_RESPONSE_HEADER_TEXT: Read these responses that have been proposed by other participants. Choose one to build upon or propose a new response.
translations.NO_IDEAS_TO_SHOW_TEXT: The other participants have not submitted enough ideas yet. Once they have, these ideas will appear here.
translations.PAUSE_MESSAGE: The process has been paused by the admin. Please, wait for a moment.

RESET_SETS_DIALOG.TITLE: Do you really want to reset the activity?
RESET_SETS_DIALOG.HELPER_TEXT: This action is definitive and will result in the loss of all the sets created in this activity.

BOT.TITLE: Act as a bot
BOT.HELPER: With the following field, you can insert new ideas in the ideation process under the identity of the virtual agent.

PROMPTS.SINGLE_RESPONSE:
We are given the following wicked problem:
<problem>
{{problemStatement}}
</problem>

Generate a single solution to this challenge. Provide only the solution and limit it to {{maxChars}} characters.
PROMPTS.SINGLE_RESPONSE_AND_PROVIDE_RESPONSES:
We are given the following problem:
<problem>
{{problemStatement}}
</problem>

So far, your teammates have proposed the following solutions to this problem:
{{responses}}
Generate a single, disruptive and out-of-the-box solution for this challenge. Your solution should challenge conventional thinking and differ from the solutions proposed by the other participants. Try to match the tone and style of the given solutions.
Provide only the solution, not enclosed in any format (no XML tags), and limit it to {{maxChars}} characters.
